column5: Which is your your office on your boat. Personally I prefer the stern.
I guess it would depend more on the boats layout and what type of fishing your doing. For me it’s the bow.
I ran a centre console, so neither ?
So do I. Mine is port side. ?
Depends if I have to use the bow mount.  I find I use it less now that I'm getting older.  I tend to like to drift around with my feet up, so I would sit in the stern.
Im a troller, I’m at the back of the boat 80% of the time.

When I need to use my TM I just drop it into the water and chill with the remote hanging around my neck. ? If had one of those fancy new auto deploy jobs I wouldn't even have to get it up off my butt!!!!   ?
Depends on how much alcohol has been consumed.
Well, that must be nice.  That's exactly what I need, just a little dear for me.
I run everything from the tiller.  S.
I was primarily a caster so I was always at the bow.
You gotta have freedom to move fast when those big slimers come out to play Brian LOL
Thats why I wear them baggy shorts Lew.  They work as a towel after landing them greasers.  Sometimes I have to take them off for a wash out there, but hey, no ones watching. ?
